entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Completion for global using static attempts to insert a regular using #68791
  • Fix LSP RequestMetrics based telemetry reporting #68790
    17.7 P4
  • Missing import discovery crash #68789
  • Implement nullable analysis for collection literals #68786
    C# 12.0
  • Implement optimizations for constructing collections from collection literals #68785
    C# 12.0
  • IDE0083 shouldn't be issued in expression trees #68784
  • "foreach (ref read)" causes an assert in assertBindIdentifierTargets for the "read" identifier #68782
    17.7
  • C# editor: A method can not be collapsed #68778
  • When renaming a GeneratedRegex method, keystrokes are duplicated, and pressing backspace commits the renaming instead of backspacing #68777
    17.8 P1
  • RegisterCodeFixesAsync never hits in custom CodeFixProvider #68776
  • false-positive CS8631 and CS8634 #68773
    C# 12.0
  • Roslyn emits invalid IL with enums that aren't expressible in C# #68770
    Compiler.Next

Closed

  • Code Style IDE0007 and IDE0008 ('var' preferences) should default to preferring var over explicit type for .Net Core 3.1 and .Net 5.0 #57359
    17.6 P2
  • Question: Source generator that uses JSON source generator? #68779
  • React to attribute centralization #68697
    C# 12.0
  • Use of proprietary license in CommonLanguageServerProtocol #68781
  • ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler is failing to load in VS #68730
    17.7
  • Assert when using `__arglist` and `in` arguments together #68714

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve parser error recovery for certain collection-literal cases #68788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove lowering to strict in #68780
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [17.6] Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #68772
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Test GetTypeInfo on values given to missing attribute #68427
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • EnC: Implement support for editing types with primary constructors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Fix parsing certain postfix expressions with top level collection literals #68787
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection literals: remove DictionaryElementSyntax #68752
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge 'InlineArrays' feature into 'main' #68783
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Add razor compiler EA project ref #68732
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Stop reporting CS7101 on runtime that supports generic updates #68601
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Fix assert when using `__arglist` and `in` arguments together #68726
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Readonly References, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Doc how to test in VSCode #68733
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Improve sequence point placement in primary constructors and records #68765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Fixes SyntaxFactory.UsingDirective overload which always throws - #68761 #68762
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fixed CA1854: Prefer IDictionary.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Retain semicolon during updates of IndexerDeclaration #68768
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix SuppressMessage attributes working on primary constructors #68706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Relax value checks for `ref readonly` parameters #68656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • "Fix" LSP semantic token modifiers #68744
    Area-IDE, untriaged
